game.title: Dragon's Lair
game.description: Travel to the depths of the Dragon's Lair, face the terrifying beast and save the town of Forestdale from its relentless attacks.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, Legendary Sword of Valor

task.description: Prepare your equipment and travel to the Dragon's Lair located South-East of Forestdale.
Battle the dragon and defeat it. It is a powerful beast, make sure you are ready for the battle.
